CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(Report_Type__c) = "CTR",
TEXT(Report_Type__c)&" - "& Customer_Name__r.Name &" - "&"Line "& Filling_Line__c &" - " & TEXT(Day(Date_of_Audit__c))&"."&TEXT(MONTH(Date_of_Audit__c))&"."&TEXT(YEAR(Date_of_Audit__c)),
TEXT(Report_Type__c)&" - "& Customer_Name__r.Name &" - "&"Site "& Filling_Site__c &" - " & TEXT(Day(Date_of_Audit__c))&"."&TEXT(MONTH(Date_of_Audit__c))&"."&TEXT(YEAR(Date_of_Audit__c)) )
CustomField.label: Formula Name
